# Snapshots 

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
snapshot_dir <- "../IGV_Snapshots/"
snapshot_files <- dir(snapshot_dir, pattern = '*.png', full.names = TRUE)

fig_str <- "

## %s

![](%s)

"

cat(sprintf(fig_str, basename(snapshot_files), snapshot_files))
```
